name: PrestaShop - Product Search, Filters, Add to Cart and Cart Verification
description: Verify product search functionality, search result filtering by category/size/color/price, adding products to cart, and validating cart contents including quantity and pricing accuracy
steps: Navigate to the PrestaShop homepage at http://localhost:8086/
Verify the homepage loads with the PrestaShop logo, a search bar in the header, and a cart icon showing 0 items
Type 't-shirt' into the search bar in the header and press Enter
Verify the search results page loads with the heading 'Search results' and displays the 'Hummingbird Printed T-Shirt' product
Note the displayed price of the Hummingbird Printed T-Shirt and verify it shows €19.12
Clear the search bar, type 'mug' and press Enter
Verify the search results show mug products including 'Mug The Best Is Yet To Come', 'Mug The Adventure Begins', and 'Mug Today Is A Good Day'
Click on 'Clothes' in the top navigation menu
Verify the Clothes category page loads and displays available filter options on the left sidebar including Size, Color, and Price
Click on the 'Size' filter and select 'M' to filter products by medium size
Verify the product listing updates and only shows products available in size M
Remove the size M filter by clicking the active M filter or the clear button
Click on the 'Color' filter and select 'White'
Verify the product listing updates to show only products available in white color
Remove the white color filter to show all clothes again
Click on the 'Hummingbird Printed T-Shirt' product from the listing to open its detail page
Verify the product detail page shows the product name, an image, the price €19.12, a size selector, a color selector, and a quantity input defaulting to 1
Select size 'M' from the size options on the product page
Set the quantity to 2 using the quantity input or the plus button
Click the 'Add to Cart' button
Verify a confirmation popup or message appears showing 'Product successfully added to your shopping cart' with the correct product name, quantity 2, and the subtotal of €38.24
Click the 'Continue Shopping' button in the confirmation popup to stay on the product page
Navigate to the 'Accessories' category from the top navigation menu and click on 'Home Accessories'
Click on the 'Mug The Best Is Yet To Come' product to open its detail page
Verify the product detail page shows the product name, price, and quantity input
Leave the quantity as 1 and click 'Add to Cart'
Verify the cart icon in the header now shows 3 total items
Click on the cart icon in the header to go to the cart page
Verify the cart page shows two line items: 'Hummingbird Printed T-Shirt' with quantity 2 and the mug with quantity 1
Verify each line item displays the correct unit price, quantity, and line total, and that the overall cart total equals the sum of all line totals
